Andrea Pearson Executive Vice President

Andrea Pearson directs HealthGradeâ€™s consumer product strategy, as well as its website and mobile operations, including traffic acquisition, product development, user experience, editorial content development, publishing and analytics. She joined HealthGrades in December 2008.

Prior to HealthGrades, Pearson was Vice President and General Manager of MapQuest.com. Under her direction as the chief strategist, monthly unique visitors to the site grew from 30 to 55 million. She joined MapQuest in 2002 and was responsible for developing site features and user experience, managing to key performance metrics. Pearson was also responsible for developing and optimizing paid search and display advertising.

Before MapQuest.com, Pearson spent ten years in key marketing/public relations positions, including DriveOff.com, where she directed online marketing and distribution programs.
